General.Name: Mind Gym Ltd
General.Description: Mind Gym plc operates as a behavioural science company in the United Kingdom, Singapore, the United States, and Canada. It offers research, strategic advice, management and employee development, employee communication, and related services. The company provides various solutions for performance management; leadership development; diversity, equity, and inclusion; onboarding; personal effectiveness; respect; customer services; change; and ethics. Mind Gym plc was incorporated in 1999 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 160 Kensington High Street, London, United Kingdom, W8 7RG
